text: Uzbeks are a Turkic-speaking ethnic group who mainly live in Central Asian countries. Uzbeks are the majority of people living in Uzbekistan. They are a minority group in Afghanistan, Tajikistan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Turkmenistan, Russia, Pakistan and China. Uzbeks speak Uzbek language of the Turkic language family. == Related pages == * Turkic peoples * Uyghur people == References == Category:Turkic peoples Category:Ethnic groups in Pakistan Category:Ethnic groups in Afghanistan Category:Ethnic groups in China
title: Uzbek people
